definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to brand/to iron/to bake (in a pan)

sentences.english: Check to make sure all soldering irons are switched OFF.
sentences.chinese: 確保所有的電烙鐵已切斷電源。

sentences.english: Meilan electric iron production of bamboo flowers, so beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 用電烙鐵生產的梅蘭竹菊，美麗非凡。

sentences.english: When the solder flows, remove the iron and let the area cool.
sentences.chinese: 當錫焊料開始流動，移開電烙鐵，使該位置降溫冷卻。

sentences.english: The litz that I have can be easily tinned by using a hot soldering iron and solder.
sentences.chinese: 用電烙鐵和焊錫可以很容易的給李茲線上錫。

sentences.english: A soldering iron can melt metal and bind joints together.
sentences.chinese: 電烙鐵可以融化金屬和關節結合在一起。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses an electric iron which can continuously adjust the temperature.
sentences.chinese: 一種在使用中可連續進行溫度調節的電烙鐵。
